entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [iOS][Maui.Essentials] File.ContentType from MediaPicker is not in MIME format #15562
  • Layout Error: Label height within VerticalStackLayout is truncated when width is set #15559
  • All texts are upside down if using .NET MAUI Blazor App with Windows 11 Arabic #15556
  • Android Device Manager briefly appears then disappears #15554
  • CollectionView inside a Grid completely wrong measurements. #15553
  • FlyoutPage on iOS net8.0 opens Flyout extremely slowly #15552
  • Add Marker Clustering to .NET MAUI Maps #15550
  • Part of the screen does not get redrawn on window resize #15549
  • Can't use custom image in a MenuItem template #15547
  • SwipeView crashes on Windows when in a CollectionView during scrolling #15546
  • Improve the InvalidCastException Messages #15545
  • Unable to debug iOS App #15542
  • Swipe Gesture within a carousel view not being Recognized in Android #15535

Closed

  • MaximumWidthRequest actually set WidthRequest. #11725
    Backlog
  • [.NET8][Regression] Recipe main page cannot be swipe down #15494
    .NET 8
  • Question #15557
  • Grid - Label Height calculation is wrong #13092
    Backlog
  • Content not rendered when setting FlowDirection as RightToLeft for ContentView in iOS and MacCatalyst #13342
    Backlog
  • Scaling of root VisualElement is ignored #11751
    Backlog
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Crash navigating between Shell tabs #11820
    Backlog
  • [Scenario Days 02 Dec] Local images not loading #11827
    Backlog
  • BindableLayout - Invalid height rendered #11987
    Backlog
  • RadioButton does not fill its width in WinUI with ControlTemplate #12241
    Backlog
  • Support for Dragging and Dropping Files from System Explorer into a .NET MAUI Application #15331
    Backlog
  • CarouselView not working properly in StackLayout #15476
  • Vision OS support #15531
  • Picker is empty #15150
  • When I copy location coordinates to an entry control, the format is modifed and I lost the "," character #15469
  • Maui on harmony os #15526

PullRequests

Created

  • Add all platforms if build args don't restrict to a single platform #15561
    area/testing
  • [iOS] Set AutoKeyboardManagerScroll's Tokens to null when disconnecting #15560
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, keyboard
  • Hook up ScrollViewer event tracking in Windows CollectionView #15555
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Add Forms->MAUI differences notes to layout dev docs #15551
    area/docs 📓, area/layout 🔲
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures
  • Restore & obsolete Windows MauiWebView ctor #15541
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview

Merged

  • Fix incorrect calculation of expansion size when *s have different scalars #15532
    area/layout 🔲
  • Skip tests currently having issues on WinUI #15527
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value #15512
    area/layout 🔲, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Fix IsSpellCheckEnabled #15459
    area/controls 🎮
  • Implement rate for TextToSpeech on supported platforms #15528
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Workaround WinUI bug with adding/removing flyouts #14985
    area/controls 🎮, control-flyout
